2024.title: Blood Meridian
2024.author: Cormac McCarthy
2024.quote: “He never sleeps, the judge. He is dancing, dancing. He says that he will never die.”

2024.title: The Road
2024.author: Cormac McCarthy
2024.quote: “In the deep glens where they lived all things were older than man and they hummed of mystery.”

2024.title: Amsterdam
2024.author: Ian McEwan
2024.quote: “Here was a rare sight below the waves, of a man's privacy and turmoil, of his dignity upended.”

2024.title: Sweet Tooth
2024.author: Ian McEwan
2024.quote: “Love doesn't grow at a steady rate, but advances in surges, bolts, wild leaps, and this was one of those.”

2024.title: Gone Girl
2024.author: Gillian Flynn
2024.quote: “I can't imagine my story without Amy. She is my forever antagonist. We are one frightening climax.”

2024.title: No Country For Old Men
2024.author: Cormac McCarthy
2024.quote: “This country is hard on people.”

2024.title: Atonement
2024.author: Ian McEwan
2024.quote: “I like to think that it isn't weakness or evasion, but a final act of kindness...to let my lovers live and to unite them.”

2024.title: The Handmaid's Tale
2024.author: Margaret Atwood
2024.quote: “...the past is a great darkness, and filled with echoes.”

2024.title: On Chesil Beach
2024.author: Ian McEwan
2024.quote: “...until she was a blurred, receding point against the immense straight road of shingle gleaming in the pallid light.”

2024.title: The Buried Giant
2024.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
2024.quote: “Wait for me on the shore, friend, I say quietly, but he does not hear and he wades on.”

2024.title: Carrie
2024.author: Stephen King
2024.quote: “It may be closer to the truth to say that Chamberlain will simply never again be.”

2024.title: Lessons
2024.author: Ian McEwan
2024.quote: “Life is messy, everybody makes mistakes because we're all fucking stupid.”

2024.author: Stephen King
2024.quote: “Dancing is life.”

2024.title: Never Let Me Go
2024.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
2024.quote: “...a tiny figure would appear on the horizon across the field, and gradually get larger until I'd see it was Tommy.”

2024.title: The Dark Tower: The Gunslinger
2024.author: Stephen King
2024.quote: “Suppose that all worlds, all universes, met at a single nexus, a single pylon, a Tower.”

2024.title: The Remains of the Day
2024.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
2024.quote: “The evening's the best part of the day. You've done your day's work. Now you can put your feet up and enjoy it.”

2024.title: The Shining
2024.author: Stephen King
2024.quote: “That's your job in this hard world, to keep your love alive and see that you get on, no matter what.”

2024.title: Misery
2024.author: Stephen King
2024.quote: “...unaware that he was weeping as he wrote.”

2024.title: IT
2024.author: Stephen King
2024.quote: “...when he almost remembers his childhood, and the friends with whom he shared it.”

2024.title: Chapterhouse: Dune
2024.author: Frank Herbert
2024.quote: “Some will choke on that medicine. But the survivors may create interesting patterns.”

2024.title: Klara and the Sun
2024.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
2024.quote: “There was something special very special, but it wasn't inside Josie. It was inside those who loved her.”

2023.title: Heretics of Dune
2023.author: Frank Herbert
2023.quote: “Hey! Old worm! Was this your design? There was no answer but then she had not really expected an answer.”

2023.title: God Emperor of Dune
2023.author: Frank Herbert
2023.quote: “But what does it mean - arafel? That's the cloud-darkness of holy judgment. It's from an old story. You'll find it all in my journals.”

2023.title: Children of Dune
2023.author: Frank Herbert
2023.quote: “One of us had to accept the agony, she said, and he was always the stronger.”

2023.title: Dune Messiah
2023.author: Frank Herbert
2023.quote: “Will you come with me, Duncan? Wherever you lead, he said.”

2023.title: Dune
2023.author: Frank Herbert
2023.quote: “While we, Chani, we who carry the name of concubine—history will call us wives.”

2023.title: The Catcher in the Rye
2023.author: J.D. Salinger
2023.quote: “It was just that she looked so damn nice, the way she kept going around and around, in her blue coat and all.”
